summary: This is an email exchange from October 24, 2019, discussing scheduling a meeting with Mark Epstein, who wants to provide information. The email notes that Mark Epstein's attorney, Stacey Richman, initiated contact and that the meeting would involve a one-way sharing of information initially.

keyFacts: Mark Epstein, through his attorney Stacey Richman, offered to meet and provide information in October 2019.
The proposed meeting was to involve a 'one-way sharing of information' initially, with the possibility of reciprocal sharing later.
Mark Epstein's 'hired ME' (possibly a medical examiner or other expert) might accompany him to the meeting.
